[DQC.US.0128.9594] The concept us-gaap:LettersOfCreditOutstandingAmount with a value of 3,154,000 and dimensions of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=btrs:PacWestBankCreditAgreementMember is greater than the default value for this concept of 2,854,000. Dimension values used with the dimension DebtInstrumentAxis should aggregate to a value no greater than the default value of 2,854,000. Either update the default value or the dimension value.
